titlStmt.titl: Replication Data for: 'Inoculation of seedlings alters fungal communities but does not improve their performance in beetle-killed sites'

citation.biblCit: Wasyliw, Josh; Fellrath, Evan G.; Cale, Jon; Franklin, James; Thomasson, Charlotte; Pec, Gregory J.; Erbilgin, Nadir; Karst, Justine, 2020, "Replication Data for: 'Inoculation of seedlings alters fungal communities but does not improve their performance in beetle-killed sites'", https://doi.org/10.7939/DVN/DGQFJG, UAL Dataverse, V3, UNF:6:1P1HhXxlHmZUDTOkyLfM4g== [fileUNF]

titlStmt.titl: Replication Data for: 'Inoculation of seedlings alters fungal communities but does not improve their performance in beetle-killed sites'

stdyInfo.abstract: Outbreaks of mountain pine beetle in western North America could have long lasting consequences for forest trajectories. In particular, changes to the soil fungal community, which accompany outbreaks, could impede successful seedling regeneration.

citation.biblCit: Wasyliw, J., Fellrath, E., Cale, J., Franklin, J., Thomasson, C., Pec, G., Erbilgin, N., & Karst, J. (2021). Inoculation of seedlings alters fungal communities but does not improve their performance in beetle-killed sites

otherMat.txt: Seedling performance data Project: Inoculation of seedlings alters fungal communities but does not improve their performance in beetle-killed sites Created by: Josh Wasyliw Date: 2020-11-20 ID_site Site identifier; each site contains 2 subplots; each subplot contains 4 quads Quad 1-4; three of quads were planted with seedlings receiving an inoculum treatment, and there was an extra quad that was seeded but no seedlings collected Subplot 2 subplots, A and B, each split into four quads Direction position of the quad Treatment One of three: Control, soil inoculum from non-attacked or attacked stands Soil_type From Evan Fellrath's survey, coded as silty or sandy Seedlings_alive_2018 Number of surviving seedlings in 2018 Seedlings_alive_2019 Number of surviving seedlings in 2019 Seedlings_planted Number of seedlings planted in 2017 Survival Seedlings alive 2019/ Seedlings planted Fresh_mass g, total biomass of pooled seedlings per quad Dry_mass g, total biomass of pooled seedlings per quad Height_2018 cm, average seedling height in 2018 for a quad; heights were measured on indvidual seedlings , number of seedlings measured to calculate average varied Height_2019 cm, average seedling height in 2019 for a quad; heights were measured on indvidual seedlings (note some of the seedlings were broken and pieces were matched), number of seedlings measured to calculate average varied
Characteristics of site location included in the study

Taxonomy table and functional guild assignments for ASV data used in the project. Functional guild assignments were made using FUNGuild (http://www.funguild.org/) Kingdom: Taxonomy assignment of ASV to "Kingdom" level; Phylum:Taxonomy assignment of ASV to "Phylum" level; Class:Taxonomy assignment of ASV to "Class" level; Order:Taxonomy assignment of ASV to "Order" level; Family:Taxonomy assignment of ASV to "Family" level; Genus:Taxonomy assignment of ASV to "Genus" level; Species:Taxonomy assignment of ASV to "Species" level; Taxonomy: Full taxonomy assignment of ASV; Guild: Guild, assigned by FUNGuild, using python script, followed by manual verification; Confidence Ranking:Confidence ranking of guild assignment, from FUNGuild
